_meanings:
{@--9@} To grow strong or 

intense; {#prasftataraM saKyaM#} <ls>Dk.</ls>

{@--11@} To break
forth or out (as fire).

{@--1@} To spread, stretch; <ls>Bk. 10. 44.</ls>
{@--2@} To stretch forward, extend, hold
out (as the hand); {#kAlaH sarvajanAn#}
{#prasAritakaro gfhRAti dUrAdapi#} <ls>Pt. 2. 20.</ls>
{@--3@} To spread out or expose for
sale; {#kretAraH krIRIyuriti budDyA#} 
{#ApaRe prasAritaM krayyaM#} <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 129.</ls>
{@--4@} To open wide, expand (as eyes).
{@--5@} To publish, promulgate.
